responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "4AB29DA946743A686C17A384A27CC3E1", "How do you know that? It is a myth known to a handful and even less than they speak words a civilized person could comprehend. The Kruja, or Scourge as it was first recorded, is a relic of a long lost battle. It was hidden in this keep which itself was hidden from any cartographer\'s eyes. The secret to revealing it rests within. Help me scour the ruins and I\'ll cut you in for any riches.")
name: MIDD_0003_RRR_DaelaKav_9
